notes.title: Note Taker Welcomes you :)
notes.text: With Note Taker, you can ADD the notes you desire. ADD a note by clicking the PENCIL ICON. DON'T FORGET to click the SAVE ICON to ensure your note is saved.

notes.title: DELETE a note.
notes.text: Note Taker also allows you to DELETE any notes you don't want. DELETE a note ny clicking the TRASH ICON next to the note you wish to be DELETED.
